entry.title: DBSteward 1.3.9 (stable)
entry.content:
Database definition tool for creation or upgrade of an existing database with a "SQL compiler" approach.
Database upgrade DDL/DML/DCL is generated from source XML, without connecting to the target database.
http://dbsteward.org/
DBSteward 1.3.9 Release
Changes * mysql5 duplicate implicit index create statement bug fix * pgsql8 index extraction PHP runtime error * miscellaneous PHP runtime warning polish * fix for slonyId slony set association to be consistent between sequences and tables * fix for parent table dependency order calculations when diffing
Supported Platform DDL Generation and Differencing: * pgsql8 - PostgreSQL 8 * mssql10 - Microsoft SQL Server 2008 * mysql5 - MySQL 5
Supported Platform Structure Extraction into XML: * pgsql8 - PostgreSQL 8 * mysql5 - MySQL 5

entry.title: DBSteward 1.3.8 (stable)
entry.content:
Database definition tool for creation or upgrade of an existing database with a "SQL compiler" approach.
Database upgrade DDL/DML/DCL is generated from source XML, without connecting to the target database.
http://dbsteward.org/
DBSteward 1.3.8 Release
Changes * Composer support - project inclusion and installation as global binary * DBSteward now reports it's version in the CLI help text * DTD validation improvements for partial definitions and extracted definitions * pgsql8 --dbport is now honored * selective identifier quoting with --quoteillegalnames flag * require slonySetId with --requireslonysetid flag * Duplicate sequence definiton fix for certain pgsql8 serial structure extractions * Improve the slonyID summary text * Remove extraneous DDL when diffing MySQL tables for changed column attributes * Fix for duplicate index creation during pgsql8 diff
Supported Platform DDL Generation and Differencing: * pgsql8 - PostgreSQL 8 * mssql10 - Microsoft SQL Server 2008 * mysql5 - MySQL 5
Supported Platform Structure Extraction into XML: * pgsql8 - PostgreSQL 8 * mysql5 - MySQL 5

entry.content:
Database definition tool for creation or upgrade of an existing database with a "SQL compiler" approach.
Database upgrade DDL/DML/DCL is generated from source XML, without connecting to the target database.
http://dbsteward.org/
DBSteward 1.3.7 Release
Changes * Fix sequence slonyId replication add and removal * Fix object quoting rules for functions * STRIP_SLONY anchors removed from upgrade scripts due to advent of --generateslonik mode delineator * Output directory and file prefix specificity * Tune pgsql8_index dimension quoting * pgsql8 function definition extraction fix for array contains value operator
Supported Platform DDL Generation and Differencing: * pgsql8 - PostgreSQL 8 * mssql10 - Microsoft SQL Server 2008 * mysql5 - MySQL 5
Supported Platform Structure Extraction into XML: * pgsql8 - PostgreSQL 8 * mysql5 - MySQL 5

DBSteward 1.3.6 Release
Changes * Windows PHP runtime / xmllint compatibility * pgsql8 index quoting fix * pgsql8 type quoting fix * mysql5/pgsql8 table foreign key name quoting consistency
Supported Platform DDL Generation and Differencing: * pgsql8 - PostgreSQL 8 * mssql10 - Microsoft SQL Server 2008 * mysql5 - MySQL 5
Supported Platform Structure Extraction into XML: * pgsql8 - PostgreSQL 8 * mysql5 - MySQL 5

http://dbsteward.org/
DBSteward 1.3.5 Release
Changes * Data table rows element overlay fix * Column Defaults and NOT NULL enforcement for new tables during diffs * Improve implicit index management for mysql5 foreign keys
Supported Platform DDL Generation and Differencing: * pgsql8 - PostgreSQL 8 * mssql10 - Microsoft SQL Server 2008 * mysql5 - MySQL 5
Supported Platform Structure Extraction into XML: * pgsql8 - PostgreSQL 8 * mysql5 - MySQL 5

entry.title: DBSteward 1.3.4 (stable)
entry.content:
Database definition tool for creation or upgrade of an existing database with a "SQL compiler" approach.
Database upgrade DDL/DML/DCL is generated from source XML, without connecting to the target database.
http://dbsteward.org/
DBSteward 1.3.4 Release
Changes * Fix false negative sequence replication detection when pgsql8 table is partitioned * pgsql8 composite type definition support * mysql5 identifier case sensitivity when diffing * pgsql8 duplicate and multi-dimensional index extraction bugs fixed * Command-line switch handling improved to not override with defaults in some contexts * Vast improvement on static data row diffing speed when overlaying large static datas * pgsql8 Reorder function defintion location for pgsql8 %TYPE usage when defining functions * mysql5 don't try to process multiple schemas when not in mysql5 schema prefix mode
Supported Platform DDL Generation and Differencing: * pgsql8 - PostgreSQL 8 * mssql10 - Microsoft SQL Server 2008 * mysql5 - MySQL 5
Supported Platform Structure Extraction into XML: * pgsql8 - PostgreSQL 8 * mysql5 - MySQL 5

entry.title: DBSteward 1.3.3 (stable)
entry.content:
Database definition tool for creation or upgrade of an existing database with a "SQL compiler" approach.
Database upgrade DDL/DML/DCL is generated from source XML, without connecting to the target database.
http://dbsteward.org/
DBSteward 1.3.3 Release
Changes * Fix XML data rows compositing: overlays for rows with the same primary key with the intention of being overwritten were not being applied * Ignore mysql5 table auto increment options by default * Handle mysql5 table extraction column default values better for values like '' and 0 * Improve mysql5 null and timestamp rules for timestamps specifying ON UPDATE clauses * Improve mysql5 index + foreign key dependency scenarios when upgrading between definitions that replace dependency indexes
Supported Platform DDL Generation and Differencing: * pgsql8 - PostgreSQL 8 * mssql10 - Microsoft SQL Server 2008 * mysql5 - MySQL 5
Supported Platform Structure Extraction into XML: * pgsql8 - PostgreSQL 8 * mysql5 - MySQL 5

DBSteward 1.3.2 Release

DBSteward 1.3.1 Release
Changes * Fix mysql5 AUTO_INCREMENT diffing where AUTO_INCREMENT modifier would not be applied * Fix mysql5 index extraction as it pertains to table primary keys * Fix mysql5 index auto-naming and name extraction
Supported Platform DDL Generation and Differencing: * pgsql8 - PostgreSQL 8 * mssql10 - Microsoft SQL Server 2008 * mysql5 - MySQL 5
Supported Platform Structure Extraction into XML: * pgsql8 - PostgreSQL 8 * mysql5 - MySQL 5

entry.title: DBSteward 1.3.0 (stable)
entry.content:
Database definition tool for creation or upgrade of an existing database with a "SQL compiler" approach.
Database upgrade DDL/DML/DCL is generated from source XML, without connecting to the target database.
http://dbsteward.org/
DBSteward 1.3.0 Release
* API Updates: - Format handler PHP fatals when certain CLI combos are used - Data row differencing when pkeys change in the same release - Addendum artifact creation mode - Allow definitions to contain sqlformat hints for platform specific definitions - refactor slony definition elements, make slony elements not required (see --generateslonik) * pgsql8 updates: - Index quoting fixes - slony replica set management expansion * mysql5 updates: - Index and column quoting fixes
Supported Platform DDL Generation and Differencing: * pgsql8 - PostgreSQL 8 * mssql10 - Microsoft SQL Server 2008 * mysql5 - MySQL 5
Supported Platform Structure Extraction into XML: * pgsql8 - PostgreSQL 8 * mysql5 - MySQL 5

DBSteward 1.2.4 Release
* pgsql8 updates: - diff language create / drop bug * mysql5 updates: - preserve ENUM case during extraction - extract columns timestamp ON UPDATE configuration properly * General updates: - Quoting of some reserved words in pgsql8 and mysql5
Supported Platform DDL Generation and Differencing: * pgsql8 - PostgreSQL 8 * mssql10 - Microsoft SQL Server 2008 * mysql5 - MySQL 5
Supported Platform Structure Extraction into XML: * pgsql8 - PostgreSQL 8 * mysql5 - MySQL 5

DBSteward 1.2.3 Release
* pgsql8 Extraction, Differencing Improvements * mysql5 Extraction, Differencing Fixes, Optimizations * Partitioned table defintion support for mysql5 and pgsql8 * Fix DTD load failures under Mac OS * Fix bin/ references under SE-Linux, Arch Linux
Supported Platform DDL Generation and Differencing: * pgsql8 - PostgreSQL 8 * mssql10 - Microsoft SQL Server 2008 * mysql5 - MySQL 5
Stubbed Platform DDL generation: * oracle10g - Oracle 10g
Supported Platform Structure Extraction into XML: * pgsql8 - PostgreSQL 8 * mysql5 - MySQL 5
